content: s make four the same please note the arms are sewn to the sides of the body below the neck and the legs are sewn underneath the skirt cast on 4 stitches with the pair of double pointed needles and work a short i-cord of around 6 row in length there s a good i-cord tutorial here if you are not familiar with this technique cut the work from the ball leaving a long tail and sew this tail end through each of the 4 stitches on the needle fig 8 slipping them off the needle as you go and then sew through the middle of the limb knot both yarn tail ends together securely repeat so that you have four identical limbs fig 9 thread the tapestry needle with the longer tail end from one of the limbs and use it to sew the limb to the body with a few stitches knot the two tail ends from the limb securely together again and sew them through the body before trimming the excess repeat with the remaining limbs fig 8 fig 9 fig 10 e a r s make two the same with yarn c and 2 25mm us 1 needles cable cast on 3 stitches leaving a 6 inch tail for sewing with later row 1 knit row 2 cast off knit-wise tie the cast on and cast off ends together tightly which will form a little curved ear fig 10 join each ear to the top of the head with a few stitches knot ends securely together and sew through the head before trimming excess cut the work from the ball and tie the cast on and cast off ends together tightly to make a tiny ear shape sew the ear to the top of the head with a few stitches knot the tail ends securely together and sew through the body before trimming the excess repeat for the second ear and there you have a little itty bitty bear christmas decoration all ready for hanging on the tree or for attaching to a nicely wrapped gift i hope you ve enjoy making this it s easy to change the pattern on the little dress either by repeating the colour-work row interspersed with 2 row of single colour and/or offsetting the contrast stitches or by using duplicate stitch to embroider a heart or other small design a self striping or hand-dyed yarn would also work well if you prefer you can make the dress extra long around 12 14 row and not bother with making the legs if you would like a rabbit instead of a bear please see my free pattern for teeny tiny toys for the rabbit ear instructions https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/teeny-tiny-knitted-toys © copyright
